column4: Hmm. Anyone raninto a problem recently where a samba/cups/netwrorked printer just stopped wrking for the rest of the pcs on the lan? it still works locally
Not sure where to start troubleshooting.. cups. or samba
try restarting samba and see if it starts working again sudo /etc/init.d/samba restart
done that. :) enabled verbose also.. checking the logs..
